entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:15 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 09:43 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: N 35 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
